Title: Rewards Program Enrolled
Subject Line: üéâ You're In! Welcome to Our Rewards Program
Content:
Hi [Customer Name],

We've just enrolled you in our new Rewards Program! You can now start earning points on your purchases and redeeming them for savings on future orders. Here is how it works:

Earning Points

  • Earn 1 Reward Point for every $1 spent and paid.
  • Points are calculated on your order total excluding shipping, tax, discounts, and account credit.
  • Points are activated and added to your account within 1‚Äì2 business days after payment is received.
  • Each set of earned Reward Points expires after 180 days, so don't forget to use them!

Redeeming Points

  • Redeem your points for a coupon code that can be used toward merchandise during checkout.
  • 100 Reward Points = $1.00 in savings.
  • Coupon codes are single-use and expire 30 days from the date they are generated.
  • Your redemption code will be emailed to you and will also appear in your account's balance history.
  • Once a coupon has been applied, the usage is final and can't be changed or credited back.

We're excited to have you in the program and can't wait for you to start enjoying the rewards. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us anytime!

Thank you for being a valued customer!
